name: Dylan Loveland
text: I never leave reviews. Especially a bad one. However this is needed. Called in at 8 o'clock for delivery, and was told the aren't doing delivery at this time because they close at 9. Okay, no biggy. Call back 2 minutes later and it rings …More

name: Shawn Marie Thierbach
text: Absolutely fabulous. Great food and great price

name: Will B
text: So we ordered 100 pizzas from them for our basketball awards celebration this past Saturday and it went off without a hitch.  They touched base a few times with us prior to and even got a follow up call today from manager who was checking …More

name: Dan Carrington
text: Always AWESOME. GREEK SALAD  AND THIN CRUST SAUSAGE ONION  MUSHROOM.  PERFECT.

name: strangerfromthealps
text: My issue? The fact that I can't order online. It's 2020. You're a chain. I should have the ability to order online and be able to use the online coupon codes at the very least! Time to catch up with the times. …More

name: Rebecca Gahgan
text: Whoever took my order was nice but that's about as good as it got.  Ordered a large meat lover's with NO SAUSAGE...replaced it with bacon and mushroom.  My fiancee doesn't like the sausage on the pizza.  Went to pick it up and the receipt …More

name: payton cupp
text: Horrible service. Called 15 times in 40 mins and no answer and after someone finally answered I said “Hello, I’ve called 15 times and nobody’s picked up but I’d like to place an order please” and the guy who answered responded with “lose …More

name: celeste mchone
text: BEST PIZZA AND LOCATION

name: Martin Mikrut
text: Thanks for responding I know you will see you this summer.

name: Samantha Litaker
text: Yuck!! Too much salt all over the burnt bread not good.

name: Levi Jordan
text: Wouldnt take my order place is junk

name: Taylor& Austin
text: They do have good food dont get me wrong but They messed up on our orders twice in a roll! Once forgot to give us our drink then yesterday mixed up our pizza toppings. …More

name: Hope Barker
text: Tall guy delivered our pizza twice. Second time pizza was bad but he went back,replaced our pizza and refused a tip. Thank you pizza guy. You rock!   Update!!! 9/28/18. Love our Hungry Howie's gals.  Once again, the staff outdoes themselves …More

name: Emily Werden
text: Hungry Howie's website is advertising a deal that if you buy a large pizza you get a medium pizza for $1 using the promo code medium1.  I was not able able to get this deal due to a miscommunication by a newly trained employee. But, after …More

name: Annette Cruse
text: My Aunt ordered a meat lovers thin crust pizza and 1 bottle of soda. They said 15 minutes.  One hour later still no pizza. She called and no one would pick up the phone, listened to music for over 10 minutes. She then decided to call …More

name: greg blackburn
text: Best pie in town

name: Jason Wilson
text: The pizza is delicious... That being said delivery is hit or miss, sometimes they have a driver,sometimes not.

name: Ami File
text: Great food, friendly service

name: William Davis
text: Went in not to long ago and (mariea) was disrespectful and didn't take my order correctly and didn't put it in the computer right said that she's new but has been there for over 3 weeks very disrespectful won't be going back anytime soon will just start going to Kalamazoo to get my food from now on.

name: Jerry Ryan
text: Employee issues affecting food quality. Fight between manager and employee in front of customers resulted in overcooked food with employee walking out leaving store short handed. 2nd time same week , lone employee couldn't keep up resulting in people waiting for overcooked food again.

name: Steve Riordan
text: Have only eaten here once although I've driven past many times.  The food is good, the service is marginal.  Keep in mind this is a very small town, and this Howie's is located in the front of the local grocery store.  Good food  but don't expect too much in the way of "dining experience".

name: Dana Slocum
text: Don't live in this town but I eat here randomly and the people are why I'm giving this rating, they are always friken nice, like nice enough youd think they knew me :) foods always good little greasy but that makes pizza great if you ask me

name: Angie Person
text: It's ok, they were actually kind of slow

name: Juliette knnights
text: I am currently on hold. I’ve been on hold for 12 mins. Last time I called they couldn’t get my card to work and got an attitude with me so I didn’t order. Probably won’t be ordering this time either.

name: Michael Newton
text: For Decatur it doesn't get any better pizza wise. :P

name: Madeline Wareham
text: Always awsome

name: Terry Fosdick
text: Awesome

name: Thomas Clapp
text: The food is good, the people are nice. But the lack of online ordering is pretty lame.

name: Monique Chavers
text: Mmm buttery bread

name: Katie Krohn
text: Just spent 15 minutes on hold with extremely rude employee only to be told it would be another 35 min for tye pizza to be done. Either staff your restuarant correctly during busy times or shut down.

name: Shanna Martin
text: I work in town and can't leave for lunch. Everytime I want pizza,  cause it sounds good I get disappointed and have no lunch. I don't call very often but when I do they either don't have a delivery driver or they have large orders and can't fit a personal pan pizza in... Very upsetting

name: Sara Alexis
text: The food is good, hot. The hold time on the phone is usually 3-6 minutes though.

name: Dee F
text: Everytime we get the same thing.  Pizza tastes ok it could be better but our orders always been right and it does the job feeding the kiddos.

name: Mike Taylor
text: Amazing staff as well as food... not just saying that because I work there :)

name: john q
text: worlds worst food ever and they barely give you any compensation if they get your order wrong. never plan on going into another howies. food is usually burnt and usually get the orders wrong. if you go there ALWAYS check your food and make sure it is what you ordered and done.
